title: Cobb Bat On Shoulder - Big-Time Eye Appeal and couple of issues
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Cobb Bat On Shoulder - Big-Time Eye Appeal and couple of issues
posts.post_content:
Trimmed Cobb with black ink added around the border on the front. No creases/wrinkles. Super nice looking card that would look great in a binder set. The last scan with Cobb in a group is just to show that the black ink around the border doesn't stand out too much and isn't distracting (imo at least).

I sent this to SGC hoping to get it into a SGC A holder, but they deemed it "excessively altered" because of the added ink and trimming.

$1060 shipped and insured PRICE DROP TO $910. Price assumes a "no fee" payment method. Paypal Goods is fine if you add 3% to the total. Price is firm.
Didn't realize I hadn't attached scans.  Sorry to everyone that looked at the listing without pictures.

Wow, if I didnt already have one, i would be over that one.
Nice eye appeal on the Cobb. GLWS.
